data.description:
Feel the thrill of shotgun shooting, hone your skills in virtual reality and challenge your friends in multiplayer competitions! Clay Hunt VR is a realistic shotgun sports game with clay shooting and hunting modes. Hunting season is always open!

Game works with just the controllers or you can attach them to a gun stock accessory for more realistic feel.

Shoot clays in various disciplines or go hunting, unlock new guns and mods like magazine for the semi-auto. Start easy with the Beginner mode and work your way up to beating the most challenging courses!

CLAY SHOOTING: American & International trap, double trap, skeet and sporting clays with multiple courses. You can even design your own five-stand courses in the new Creative mode. Clay pigeon flight paths and leads are accurately simulated.

HUNTING: Ducks, pigeons and pheasant drives in varying bird hunting challenges! Get more with add-ons: upland hunting with your dog and the thrilling boar hunting (they do try to knock you out)!

MULTIPLAYER: Join the Discord channel and participate on competitions or go shooting with friends on a private room.

GUN STOCKS: Play with just the controllers or attach them to a gun stock for a more realistic feel. You can calibrate most of the gun stocks but for serious practice, we recommend the Real Stock Pro from Texture VR. You can adjust the dimensions and the weight to match your real shotgun. Find more information about the gun stocks available in the Clay Hunt VR Facebook group.

changelog.change_log:
- Two new Pheasant Drives: A and C\n
- New Sporting Course.\n
- Buy 10k XP points ($9.99) to support the development of the game and to unlock guns & mods instantly. Press the “+” button on the XP hud on top of the menu to buy.\n
- You earn now bit more XP points on Duck Hunt, Upland hunting and Boar Hunting.\n
- Bug fixes.

- NEW GUN: premium over-under with multiple rib options.\n
- Custom skeet round: Find the custom skeet configuration in the “Full Round” panel and as the last item in the rule selector. Configure the sequence, rules and target velocity for your needs. For now, you can have only one custom configuration.\n
-Target indicators adjusted.\n
-Chokes are now shown visually.

- Creative Multiplayer & share your courses to players in the same multiplayer room.\n
- Pheasant Drive Practise mode now shows feedback on where you missed.\n
- Back rib can now be removed from the semi-auto shotgun with a mod.\n
- Bug fix: Creative difficulty setting was not working.\n
- There’s now a button to request for Bluetooth permission which is required for the ForceTube recoil accessory.\n
- Party Challenge difficulty adjusted.\n
- Bug fixes.

Version 1.4.5:
- Party Challenge: Take turns with your guests and play through a short introduction, trap shooting & pigeon hunting and see who’s best!\n
- American trap: Thrower moved underground.\n
- Olympic trap: sequence corrected to have fewer straight targets.\n
- Over-Under shoots now bottom barrel first.\n
- Pigeon hunt environment improved.

-Boar Hunting multiplayer now available!\n
-Improved clay pigeon visibility.\n
-Boar hit recognition improved & challenge adjusted. NOTE: Boar Hunting leaderboards were cleared.\n
-Bug Fixes

- Improved the pheasant drive environment.\n
- Bug fix: Instructions on how to reload pump action was not shown

-BUG FIX: Reloading did not work for two barrel shotguns in Boar hunting when auto reload was enabled.\n
-Adjusted the flight of the American Trap clay pigeons to be bit lower.

Boar Hunting Add-on is now available! Buy it inside the app by selecting “Boar Hunting” in the Hunting menu. Go hunting driven wild boars with buck shots, but be ready as it’s game over if you get knocked out! Multiplayer support will come early next year.

- Bird hunting hit recognition improved.\n
- Bug fix: Black screen issue in multiplayer.\n
- Bug fix: Pheasant drive multiplayer could go off sync if all players weren’t active when the game started.\n
- Some Christmas cleaning in the club-house.

-BUG FIX: It was possible to shoot while the game was paused\n
-Creative Mode: It’s now possible to disable the allowed distance check for rabbits by setting the slider value to far right.\n
-Gun Settings: It’s now possible to adjust POI to 150.\n
-Visuals on the over-under shotgun improved.

- Release Trigger option added to the gun stock mode\n
- BUG FIX: Saving did not work on Creative courses after renaming them.
Bug fix: Second hand with gun stock mode was not disabled correctly when exiting the Creative mode.

-Instructions added on how to access creative course configuration.\n
-UI button for course configuration added.\n
-Full choke modified to be bit more tight and forgiving in long distances.\n
-Pull is not called with your secondary controller if it’s not holding the gun.

-Clay target flight physics improved.\n
-Bug fix: Full Analysis shot pattern shown in Creative test pair.\n
-Bug fix: Gun settings view did not show the correct choke.

- Creative mode added: Design your own 5-stand courses! 5-stand course consists of five shooting stations with 5 targets each: one single and two pairs. Stations share throwers with each other. To create a course, add 1 to 10 throwers and configure the pairs. You can test/practise individual targets while editing.\n
- Bug fixes.

- Fixed dropped frames by reverting to an older system SDK.\n
- Smoother visuals for Quest 3

- Quest 3 optimizations\n
- "Tracking" mode for secondary controller when using gun stock is not recommended with Quest 3.\n
- Updated preset for the Real Stock Pro with Quest 3.\n
- Bug fixes
